H0.text: The left ventricle has a much thicker muscular layer than the right ventricle.

H1.text: Middle is the ventricle of the heart whose muscular layer is much thicker.

H2.text: Upper is the ventricle of the heart in which the muscular layer is much thicker.

H3.text: Right is the ventricle whose muscular layer is much thicker in the heart.

A4.text: The left ventricle is much thicker as compared with the right, due to the greater force needed to pump blood to the entire body.
